name: Hermès Birkin 30
description: The legendary Birkin bag in Togo leather with palladium hardware. A symbol of ultimate luxury.
care_instructions: Professional Hermès care only. Store in dust bag and box.
story: Created for Jane Birkin in 1984, it remains the most coveted bag in the world.
meta_description: Classic Hermès Birkin 30 in Togo leather with palladium hardware

name: Hermès Kelly 28
description: Elegant structured bag with single handle and signature turn-lock closure.
care_instructions: Keep in dust bag. Avoid moisture exposure.
story: Named after Grace Kelly, who used it to shield her pregnancy from photographers.
meta_description: Timeless Hermès Kelly 28 in Epsom leather with gold hardware

name: Hermès Constance 24
description: Sophisticated shoulder bag with iconic H clasp. Perfect day-to-evening bag.
care_instructions: Clean with soft cloth. Store properly stuffed.
story: Created in 1959 and named after the designer's daughter.
meta_description: Elegant Hermès Constance 24 with signature H clasp

name: Hermès Evelyne III 29
description: Casual yet luxurious crossbody with perforated H logo. Perfect for everyday use.
care_instructions: Wipe clean with damp cloth. Air dry naturally.
story: Originally designed for grooming equipment, now a contemporary classic.
meta_title: Hermès Evelyne III 29 - Casual Luxury Bag
meta_description: Hermès Evelyne III with perforated H logo in Clemence leather

name: Hermès Garden Party 36
description: Elegant tote in country leather with canvas lining. Perfect for daily use.
care_instructions: Regular leather conditioning. Keep shape when stored.
story: Inspired by the elegance of French garden parties.
meta_description: Hermès Garden Party tote in Negonda leather with canvas lining
